segments.text: Look , Bob . This is a photograph I took during my trip to Australia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see it , can I ? This is a good photograph . Who are these people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They ’ re people I met during the trip . That ’ s the ship we traveled on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a beautiful ship ! Who ’ s this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s the man I told you about . Remember ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah yes . The one who offered you a job in Australia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s not you , is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right . I grew a beard during the trip , but I shaved it off when I came home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why did you shave it off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wife didn ’ t like it !
segments.speaker: S1
